title: Curated Set
description: A file set for reference files which are utilized in the analysis of IGVF experiments. For example, genomic references from GENCODE.

file_set_type.description: The category that best describes this curated file set.
file_set_type.comment: File set type describes the content of the curated set.

enum_descriptions.barcodes: List(s) of barcodes identifying cells in a single cell experiment.
enum_descriptions.editing templates: Used in Saturation Genome Editing (SGE) assays.
enum_descriptions.elements: List(s) of elements in the genome to be assayed.
enum_descriptions.external data for catalog: Public reference files from other sources external to IGVF & ENCODE utilized in the IGVF catalog.
enum_descriptions.functional effect: Predictive modeling on functional effect. This is reserved for hosting ENCODE predictive modeling data; IGVF predictive modeling of functional effects should be submitted to a prediction set instead.
enum_descriptions.guide RNAs: List(s) of guide RNAs used in CRISPR assays.
enum_descriptions.pipeline parameters: For hosting files describing pipeline parameters for use in an analysis.
enum_descriptions.primer design: For hosting files describing the design of primers.
enum_descriptions.QTL: For hosting files containing QTL (quantitative trait loci) data files.
enum_descriptions.training data for predictive models: For hosting files describing the training data of predictive models,
